last_episode_to_air.name: ... A Better Place
last_episode_to_air.overview: The two families are forced to confront their decisions as Sara's life hangs in the balance.

name: Betrayal
overview: A chance meeting between photographer Sara Hadley and Attorney Jack McAllister leads to an instant and undeniable attraction. Just as Sara and Jack's affair is starting, the lovers find themselves in an impossible situation—on opposite sides of a murder investigation.
tagline: They have no idea what they've started.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: In this drama's opener, a photographer begins an affair with a lawyer for a powerful family, but their secret's in jeopardy when her ambitious husband is the prosecutor in a high-profile murder case in which her paramour is defending the prime suspect.

episodes.name: Except When A Bear Is Chasing You
episodes.overview: Sara recommits to her marriage to Drew after learning who Jack really is. Meanwhile, Jack and Drew are now adversaries as the investigation of the murder that has rocked the Karsten family proceeds.

episodes.name: If You Want the Fruit ...
episodes.overview: Sara is distracted by heart-racing fantasies as she tries to resist her attraction to Jack; Drew and Jack face off in court during T.J.'s bail hearing; Connie fears for her life.

episodes.name: ... That Is Not What Ships Are Built For
episodes.overview: Sara is confronted about her recent whereabouts; Karsten is willing to do anything to stay in power; T.J. seeks independence.

episodes.name: ... Nice Photos
episodes.overview: Sara's secret trysts with Jack bolster her confidence; T.J.'s new friend finds an important piece of evidence; Drew tries to coerce Brandy.

episodes.name: ... The Things That Drive Men Crazy
episodes.overview: Sara's concerns intensify; a difficult confession leaves Jack vulnerable; Drew obsesses on finding out what his wife has been up to.

episodes.name: ... We're Not Going to Bailey's Harbor
episodes.overview: Jack and Sara face the repercussions of Drew's discovery; Elaine turns to an unlikely source for support; Zarek takes drastic measures to deal with Brandy.

episodes.name: ... One More Shot
episodes.overview: T.J. is unable to cope with a traumatic event; Karsten is forced to confront his past; Drew and Sara struggle with their new home dynamic and its impact on their son.

episodes.name: ... It's Just You and Me Now
episodes.overview: Jack whisks Sara away for a romantic road trip, even as the FBI is tracking him down. As T.J. is unable to cope with Brandy’s death or find his place at Karsten Allied, his reckless behavior turns dangerous. Karsten decides to settle the score with Jack by making a deal with an unlikely ally.

episodes.name: ... Number 16.
episodes.overview: Elaine and Aidan struggle to define their relationship; Jack moves forward with Sara; Drew's renewed interest in the case yields shocking results.

episodes.name: ... The Karsten Way
episodes.overview: A confession rocks the Karsten and McAllister families; Sara revisits the past in hope of finding exonerating evidence.

episodes.name: "Sharper than a serpent's tooth..."
episodes.overview: Old habits are hard to break for Sara and Drew, but Jack and Elaine struggle with a turbulent time with their kids. Meanwhile, Drew and Jack form an unlikely alliance to work together against Karsten.

episodes.name: ... A Better Place
episodes.overview: The two families are forced to confront their decisions as Sara's life hangs in the balance.
